books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 12th book in the Virgil Flowers series. A fight between university departments turns deadly.
books.name: BLOODY GENIUS

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A young man who was gifted with a mysterious power becomes part of a war between slavers and the enslaved.
books.name: THE WATER DANCER

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Children with special talents are abducted and sequestered in an institution where the sinister staff seeks to extract their gifts through harsh methods.
books.name: THE INSTITUTE

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: A sibling relationship is impacted when the family goes from poverty to wealth and back again over the course of many decades.
books.name: THE DUTCH HOUSE

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a sequel to “The Handmaid’s Tale,” old secrets bring three women together as the Republic of Gilead’s theocratic regime shows signs of decay.
books.name: THE TESTAMENTS

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: Mexican cartels, ISIS and a possible pandemic bring Mitch Rapp back into action.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: LETHAL AGENT

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: A former prisoner of war returns from Vietnam and moves his family to Alaska, where they face tough conditions.
books.name: THE GREAT ALONE

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A visitor helps the McCullough family beyond expectation during the holiday season.
books.name: A MRS. MIRACLE CHRISTMAS

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A 16-year-old, who sleeps with a concentration camp commandant in order to survive, is sentenced to a Siberian prison camp where she cares for the ill.
books.name: CILKA'S JOURNEY

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In the Republic of Gilead’s dystopian future, men and women perform the services assigned to them.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by Joe Hill
books.description: A collection of short stories including two written with Stephen King: “Throttle” and “In the Tall Grass.”
books.name: FULL THROTTLE

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers investigates shootings in a Minnesota town following an attempt to revive its ailing economy.
books.name: HOLY GHOST

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH
